about_the_game:
Experience Thrilling Aerial Combat in the Warplanes: Air Corp Demo!


Dive into adrenaline-pumping action with our demo of Warplanes: Air Corp in VR! Master the skies in this preview of the third installment from the acclaimed Warplanes series, where modern military aviation meets heart-pounding combat. Get a taste of piloting prowess with a curated selection of aircraft and engaging missions.

Features in the Demo

Two Out of Ten Maps in "Free Flight" Mode: Soar through the skies in two distinct environments, offering a glimpse into the expansive world of Warplanes: Air Corp. Test your piloting skills and explore the immersive landscapes that set the stage for intense aerial battles.

Full Tutorial Mode: Hone your abilities and familiarize yourself with the controls in a comprehensive tutorial. Learn the ins and outs of handling both a helicopter and a fighter.

Two Out of Nine Playable Aircraft: Take control of these powerful machines:
  • AH-1V - King Cobra: Dominate the skies as you maneuver this deadly attack helicopter.
  • S-MF-16 - Eagle: Experience the speed and agility of this high-performance fighter jet.

Key Highlights of the Full Game


Diverse Aircraft Arsenal: Discover a total of nine meticulously designed aircraft inspired by top combat machines worldwide. Each offers unique capabilities and strategies for conquering the skies.

Single-player Campaign: An engaging and challenging single-player campaign. Earn credits, buy new machines for your squadron, upgrade them and stock them with a variety of deadly weapons.

Multiplayer Modes: Challenge players worldwide in classic PvP modes or team up with friends for thrilling co-op missions, adding depth and excitement to your aerial adventures.
